name: Tetrapol 3D
description:
🎮 How to play?

📌 W or ( ↑ )  |  Forward Movement
📌 S or   ( ↓ )  |  Back Movement
📌 A or  (←)  |  Left Movement
📌 D or  (→)  |  Right Movement
📌 Mouse Right Click  |  Camera Movement
📌 R        |  Restart Game
📌 ESC  |  Exit Game

🎮 Functions of Game Objects

📌 Objective:  Win the game by activating the red buttons. (10/10)
📌 Blue buttons make the character jump.
📌 Teleport pods can be used unlimitedly, randomly teleporting you to another pod.
📌 Bridges can only be used once, after which they fall.
📌 Knitting, traps and falling cause the character to burn.
📌 When you crashed, the game starts again.

🔹Have fun!🔹
